General.Name: Srivichaivejvivat Public Company Limited
General.Description: Srivichaivejvivat Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand. It offers medical services, such as trauma and emergency center, pediatric center, obstetrics and gynecology center, stroke system center, health check-up center, gastroenterology and liver clinic, internal medical clinic, cardiovascular center, vascular surgery, laparoscopic surgery center, ophthalmic clinic, neurological and brain clinic, dental clinic, x-ray center, breast clinic, hemodialysis center, occupational medical clinic, laparoscopic surgery, social security clinic, physical therapy, dermatology and laser surgery clinic, plastic surgery clinic, gallstones and prostate center, cancer clinic, joint radiotherapy center, child development center, sports medical center, anti- ageing wellness center, traditional Chinese center, infertility treatment center, urology center, and ear, nose and throat clinic. It also operates a vocational school. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Krathum Baen, Thailand.
General.Address: 74/5 Moo 4, Phetkasem Road, Krathum Baen, Thailand, 74130
